Title: Dui Rupaiya
Actors: Nischal Basnet, Asif Shah, Buddhi Tamang, Menuka Pradhan
Plot: One day, while conducting such smuggling, they lose the transaction slip - a Rs. 2 note. The film "Dui Rupaiyan" entails their quest to find that Rs. 2 and save their necks, all the while saving themselves from local thugs, police, and their boss too.
